Package tutoring

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • tutoring.Person
      • tutoring.Student
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tutor, Tutored
    public class Student
extends Person
    A student is the same as a person with a number of absences, a study level and grades
    Author:
    quentin.barlet.etu, simon.bocquet.etu, marine.sandras.etu
